Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous and well placed”
Reviews.Author: Patchfi
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed nights november bathroom bedroom sizes paris standards decor excellent warm welcoming hotel positioned access opera restaurants block radius star hotel limited amenities fridge english channel tv repeating programming day issue rest sleep little bar door sold water evening returned glass bottles morning couple minor issues noted bathroom tiles shower getting decidely tatty grout cleaning replacing remove mould night bathroom door closed hear people arguing vent staff excellent little knowledge tourist info friendly welcoming

Reviews.Title: “GREAT Hotel in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Nora M
Reviews.Content: hotel paris centrally located walking distance opera department stores super friendly staff larger experienced similar priced hotels paris organic breakfast buffet inexpensive paris 9 euros weather nice lucky able rooftop terrace bottle wine dinner definitely return

Reviews.Title: “Decent with flaws”
Reviews.Author: andrecav
Reviews.Content: hotel indeed clean somewhat cosy free wifi location ok incredibly bathroom horrible window view worst noise inevitably hear time people wooden stairs sometimes friendly staff value hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good value, large triple room”
Reviews.Author: imi138
Reviews.Content: booked triple hotel based tripadvisor reviews pleased size norm europe especially paris grateful extra space feel cramped clean hotel location 20 mins walk louvre

Reviews.Title: “Good value - would stay again”
Reviews.Author: chana2
Reviews.Content: nb stayed 2010 date stay didnt option chose solely central location value service boot staff friendly helpful wifey pregnant stairs bit tiring bathroom fine price especially using sleeping base else

Reviews.Title: “Great value, Great Location, Great for 2-Star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: michellez_11
Reviews.Content: front staff desk helpful 2star hotel looking value paris location stay ac elevator comfortable bed world expecting 2star hotel larger 4star hotel stayed nice clean bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, amazing location”
Reviews.Author: 3london
Reviews.Content: hotel located 5 minutes opera garnier boulevard haussmann whith paris famous shops galeries lafayette printemps montmartre 10 minutes walk itâ€™s close metro lines 7 12 lines perfect arrive depart gare de louvre champs elysees notre dame hotel located quiet street happy backyard probably hot summer time regular airconditioning closets ventilators air hotter days mini barfridge noise comes inside hotel walls thin accordingly recommend earplugs light sleep clean dust cushions wall bed mirrors read feedback tripadvisor guests attacked toilet role holder wondering obviously person roll holder dangerous tripadvisor elevator hotel itâ€™s hotel floors receptionists offer help luggage didnâ€™t try wireless internet instead computer lobby check emails etc breakfast paris standard baguette croissant chocolate bread cereals jam yoghurt cheese people reception friendly helpful stay loved location definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “I'm definitely going back!”
Reviews.Author: nellynell8
Reviews.Content: lovely hotelreally close metro station various shopsrestaurants amazingly polite helpfulno stairs pricey offers croissants baguettes plenty breakfast aroundwe stayed cosy street safethe wc space bath convenient morning 4 people clean welli absolutely loved hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel with a few flaws”
Reviews.Author: Kiwikid0
Reviews.Content: stayed night close cdg airport bus stop easy walk nice size bathroom else tiny toilet impossible yes toilet roll holder hanging loose loo attacked highly dangerous cause nasty injury mind chose crazy breakfast okay quickness left airport usual paris breakfast overpriced owners nice helpful fault stay near opera garnier galeries lafayette location excellent

Reviews.Title: “Great location, lovely hotel.”
Reviews.Author: nimrodnm
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights ov er hotel fantastic location close metro stops various lines near stop opera roissy bus cdg airport top tour bus paris hotel bit noisy shut door outside door quietens lot hotel affordable comparison nice traditional location provide base nice time paris

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, free internet and close to Galleries Lafayette.”
Reviews.Author: Lisa8383
Reviews.Content: hotel clean close underground train station breakfast nice staff friendly helpful hotel doesnt lift makes difficult heavy luggage pretty affordable location makes forget climb stairs

Reviews.Title: “good stay at hotel mogador”
Reviews.Author: losita
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 2 nights october 19th 20th 2010 quiet sleep couldnt tub shower hotel run hot water morning location ideal reception staff marvelous helping try taxi morning strike

Reviews.Title: “Charming and cosy hidden jewel”
Reviews.Author: Martuszka
Reviews.Content: hidden jewel offering excellent value money decorated taste slightly style personnel nice genuinely satisfaction disadvantage hotel located renovated walkup building prepared drag suitcase stairs luckily summer paris window didnt close fixed hotel staff serious winter hotel nice terrace tables chairs offers excellent opportunity admire parisian stairs

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised by excellent value hotel in Paris”
Reviews.Author: AngDav99
Reviews.Content: am nervous arriving hotels paris price bracket bad experiences hotel wonderful spacious clean bathrooms appointed location building norm paris little noisy morning heading day perfect cant wait stay highly recommend kept waiting catch easy walking distance attractions
